  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_343</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_343</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Resolución geométrica de ecuaciones</string>
            <string language="en">Solving equations graphically</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichungen graphisch lösen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Résolvant des équations graphiquement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Resolvendo equações gràfica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risolvendo le equazioni graficamente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λύνοντας τις εξισώσεις γραφικά</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones la resolución de ecuaciones de primer grado con una incógnita. Se estudia la forma de resolverlas analítica y geométricamente y se finaliza con problemas de aplicación de las ecuaciones de primer grado.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to solve linear equations with one variable. It studies how to solve the equations analytically and geometrically, and it includes exercises with applications of linear equations.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">primer grado</string>
            <string language="en">linear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ecuación</string>
            <string language="en">equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">problema</string>
            <string language="en">problem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">método gráfico</string>
            <string language="en">graphical method</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">método analítico</string>
            <string language="en">analytical method</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, lineare Gleichungen mit einer Variable zu lösen. 
Sie studiert, wie man die Gleichungen analytisch und geometrisch
löst, und sie schließt Übungen mit Anwendungen der linearen 
Gleichungen ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de résoudre des équations linéaires avec une variable. 
Elle étudie comment résoudre les équations analytiquement et 
géométriquement, et elle inclut des exercices avec des applications 
des équations linéaires.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações resolver 
equações lineares com uma variável. Estuda como resolver 
analìticamente e geomètrica as equações, e inclui exercícios com 
aplicações de equações lineares.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
risolvere le equazioni lineari con una variabile. Studia come 
risolvere le equazioni analiticamente e geometricamente ed include le 
esercitazioni con le applicazioni delle equazioni lineari.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να λύσει τις γραμμικές εξισώσεις με μια μεταβλητή. 
Μελετά πώς να λύσει τις εξισώσεις αναλυτικά και 
γεωμετρικά, και περιλαμβάνει τις ασκήσεις με τις εφαρμογές των 
γραμμικών εξισώσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">linear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Problem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">graphische Methode</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">analytische Methode</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">linéaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
